note.p: Daughter of Charles Arthur Aikin, physician, and his wife Louisa Jane. Married John Millar Thomson in Paddington in 1875.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/25/5/4)
London Church of England parish registers P87/ALL/006 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 November 2022)
Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1 (1933): 91–4, s.v. John Millar Thomson
